summary:
My first mod!
Morrigan from Dragon Age Origins as a follower
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][i][img]http://images4.fanpop.com/image/photos/15000000/Morrigan-concept-art-dragon-age-origins-15058002-1200-758.jpg[/img]
[size=6]update: [/size][/i][/size]
[size=5]STOPPED WORKING ON THIS MOD.

[/size][size=5][i][size=6]My first mod![/size][/i][/size][size=6] [/size][size=3]PLEASE READ.
[/size]
[color=#cccccc][size=2]So, I'm learning how things work. If you have any bugs, comment, and maybe me give suggestions to help me (I'm new at this!).[/size]
[color=#9900ff]
[color=#8e7cc3][size=3]Morrigan from Dragon Age Origins as a follower, couldn't give her a more similar hair cause it didn't work in game.
[color=#f4f4f4]She has some spells, and habilities. I didn't make her [i]too[/i] good so it wouldn't feel like she's invincible haha[/color].
[/size][/color][/color]
Made with [color=#1e84cc][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]NPC editor[/color][color=#efefef]-[/color] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?

[/size][/color][/color][color=#00ff00][size=5]Location UPDATED: Dragonbridge - Four Shields INN[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][color=#00ff00][size=5]
[/size][/color][b]If your having problems to find her, use the command Help Morrigan then player.place at me and her id, yes it will bring a copy of her but at least you can have it =)[/b]

[size=5]STOPPED WORKING ON THIS MOD.
I CAN NOT accept images of her using the original robes guys, it will be deleted cause it violates the terms! Anyway thanks for all the lovely images you send me.[/size]
[/color][color=#cccccc][size=4]

[/size][size=6]Requirements:[/size]
[size=5]UPDATE: You can try loading her without any of these, but if anything goes wrong, install the mods below

[u]Hair and eyes[/u]:[/size]
[color=#6aa84f][size=3]The eyes of beauty[/size][/color][size=3] by LogRaam - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?
[color=#ffe599]ApachiiSkyHair[/color] by Apachii - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168
KS Hairdo's - no longer avaible, search on google[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]If you want to change her hairstyle in game:[/size][/color] www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470 (suggestion of [/color][color=#cccccc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4161222]PestMastah[/url], thanks!)
[size=4]
[u]Clothes:[/u][/size]
[/color][color=#cccccc][size=3][color=#ff00ff][size=4][color=#c27ba0]Ancient Morrigan Armor [color=#efefef]by raptorv22[/color][/color] [color=#f4f4f4]-[/color] [color=#f4f4f4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1920/?[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8][color=#ff0000][size=5]Note: apparently her original robes pictures and link were removed cause violated the terms, so I can just tell you guys to search for her original clothes mod on google :([/size][/color]

[size=5]Recommended mods:[/size][/color][/size][/color][/size]
[size=3]To make her look like the pictures (what I used)[/size][/color][size=3]
[/size][size=2][size=3]For the skin I use SG Female Textures Renewal - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?[/size]
[/size][size=5]
[size=6]Installation and credits[/size][/size][size=6]:[/size][size=4]
Thanks to rjoscher for fixing the esp file problems! ;D[/size]
[color=#c27ba0][size=3]Manual:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Place the folders inside [i]meshes[/i] and [i]textures[/i] on their respective folders inside Data folder in the game directory, and the .esp file inside Data folder. (Don't
forget to check in Skyrim Launcher if it is activated.)

[color=#00ffff]NMM:[/color] Download the rar, add it to Nexus Mod Manager, activate, done.[/size]
author: MoonPsychosis
